text: Jui Khurd is a village in the Bhiwani district of the Indian state of Haryana. It lies approximately south west of the district headquarters town of Bhiwani. , the village had 1,303 households with a total population of 6,821 of which 3,631 were male and 3,208 female. ==References== Category:Villages in Bhiwani district
title: Jui Khurd
